name: Call fur Help
description:
Call for Help is a fun physics-based game that aims to immerse you in the world of firefighting kittens.

Are you ready to save the city? As a professional firecat, you'll have the task of extinguishing all the fires that threaten it. Your team may not be the most skilled, but it's the most initiative-driven. Reload your water tank, destroy debris, and extinguish every last flame!



  • Cooperative Mode!
You can tackle the fires solo or with fellow feline friends. Up to four people can battle the most dangerous fires to determine who the top firefighter is. Be careful not to get angry; friendship should not be extinguished.

  • Obstacles!
Are furniture blocking your path? Clear them out of your way! Push and destroy anything necessary to save this city.



  • Action!
Extinguishing a fire isn't as simple as you think; every second counts. Make the wrong decision, and you might end up in flames yourself.



  • Cats!
Choose your favorite Firecat and start saving the city!
